method.name: PUT
method.doc: To update a tracing configuration file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the Reverse Proxy configuration tracing configuration file resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: file_contents
param.doc: The file content to be imported as application or octet-stream.

param.name: file
param.doc: The file that contains the new data as application/octet-stream.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
